scenarios.title: Neighborhood Connections
scenarios.description: A client is housed in a new neighborhood and feels isolated.
scenarios.question: What is the best first step?

options.B: Introduce the client to neighbors and nearby community spaces
options.C: Move to a PSH building immediately
options.D: Wait for the client to reach out

scenarios.explanation: Introducing neighbors and local spaces supports integration and inclusion.

scenarios.title: Transit Orientation
scenarios.description: The client wants to join a community program but is unsure about travel routes.
scenarios.question: What supports integration?

options.B: Accompany on the first trip to learn the route

scenarios.explanation: Accompanying early trips builds confidence and access to resources.

scenarios.title: Placement Review
scenarios.description: At the three‑month follow‑up, the client reports safety concerns and poor fit in the area.
scenarios.question: What should the team consider?

options.B: Review supports and consider adjustments in placement or plan

scenarios.explanation: Monitoring & adjustment includes revisiting supports and placements based on feedback.
